sentences.sContent: You tuck your secret away in an unexpected place, like an MP3 or a photo file, to conceal the fact you even shared any information at all.
sentences.sContent_eng: You tuck your secret away in an unexpected place, like an MP3 or a photo file, to conceal the fact you even shared any information at all.
sentences.sCn: 你将你的秘密“卷起来”，放在一个意想不到的地方，比如MP3或照片文件，这样就掩盖了你曾经分享信息的事实。

synos.tran: 卷起；挤进；用某物舒适地裹住；使有褶裥；收拢；大口吃；使隐藏
食物；船尾突出部；缝摺；抱膝式跳水；活力；鼓声
缝褶裥；缩拢；舒服地裹在里面；大口吃

phrases.pCn: 塔克修士（罗宾汉传说中的人物，是罗宾汉的牧师兼管家）

words.tran: 领布；打褶装置；打横褶的人

trans.tranOther: a pleat or fold in a part of a garment, usually stitched down so as to make it a better fit or as decoration
